student.name: Student
student.description: Motivated recent graduate, attentive and dynamic. Solid academic background with initial experience through internships and student projects. Proficient with computer tools and quick learning ability.

archivist.name: Assistant Archivist
archivist.description: Passionate about organizing and preserving documents. Methodical and rigorous, with good digital tool skills. Able to work independently and in a team.

beginner.name: First Job
beginner.description: Enthusiastic and versatile high school graduate, ready to put my knowledge into practice. Strong adaptability and willingness to learn. Proficient with basic office tools.

meta.title: Guidy | Create a Professional CV in 5 Minutes with AI | Resume Builder
meta.description: Create a free ATS-optimized CV with our AI. International templates, personalized career advice, and interview preparation. Available in English. Professional resumes in minutes!
meta.keywords: AI CV, ATS CV, resume builder, AI CV, cover letter, interview preparation, CV template, international resume, career advice, global job search, Canada CV, France CV, USA CV, Africa CV, UK resume, international careers, Francophone CV, Anglophone CV
